name: Cube Dodge - v.Alpha.2021.10.05
description:
This game is just for fun. I made this with some help from Brackey's yt channel. Thus, the idea is not mine. (Btw the user play time is like 20 seconds... It's not worth playing it :P)

CONTROLS

Letter ASlide leftLetter DSlide rightEscapeExit Game (doesn't work all the times)ShiftSpeed Up

I am not working on this project much so I don't know when I will update it.
